locations.name: Albany
locations.description: Food pantry offering monthly visits for pantry items and multiple visits for produce. Walk-up or call-in pickup available with curbside service. Also operates soup kitchen on Tuesdays 9am-1:30pm. Produce available Mondays and Wednesdays 10-12, 1-3.

locations.name: Albany
locations.description: Food pantry that accepts everyone, call for an appointment. Tuesday-Friday 9am-3pm. May be able to serve emergency food on Mondays

locations.name: Albany
locations.description: Guests can visit once a month. walk in. Pre-packed with the exception of meat, dairy products and produce

locations.name: Albany

locations.name: Albany
locations.description: Food pantry where guests can utilize pantry 1-2 times a month. Must call for appointment, client choice available. Also offers soup kitchen services Monday & Thursday 11:45-12:45.

locations.name: Albany
locations.description: Food pantry operated by Israel AME Church

locations.name: Albany
locations.description: Food pantry operated by Mater Christi Church. Updated proof of address is required every 4 months. Will serve emergency bags by appointment. locations.name: Albany
locations.description: Food pantry providing food assistance to community members. Entrance on St. James Pl- door on the right side of the parking lot. Guests can visit once a month. locations.name: Albany
